Gördüğüm en keyifli oyunlardna bir tanesi. 2 kişilik modu çok zevkli. Şiddetle tavsiye edebileceğim oyunlardan.
Bulmaca mantığında ki yapısı ve bölüm sonlarında konuşan hanım ablamızda dahil olmak üzere sıkılmayacağınızın garantisini verebilirim. Fiyatı da ( indirimli hali 3.5 Türk Lirası) çok uygun. Bazı bölümlerde beyniniz alev alabilir, ama ona rağmen sürükleyici. Oyun yerinde bitiyor, kısa gelebilir belki diğer oyunlara göre. Ama Kafi, tatmin edecektir :)

极品游戏。
2017秋季促销入手。
2017.12.8刚开始玩。
感受:
第一次开启在网吧玩，朋友说“这##是VR游戏吧”。3D代入感极强，画质精美。推荐使用大屏游戏，晕3d的还是建议小屏游戏。大屏和小屏真的是一个完全不同的世界。
由于初次玩，一开始你并不了解它，但是在不断思考中你会不断熟悉这个游戏。有时候你会卡在某一关，你可以尝试乱点乱跳，或许你就解决了某个关卡，然后惊叹“woc还有这种操作”。
这是个脑洞很大的游戏，你要有丰富的想象力，你需要发散思维，并且利用之前关卡得到的丰富经验去构造传送门，千万不要固化你的思维模式。
当然，游戏过程中你会遭遇一些空间内没有传送的能力，不算是bug，你可以通过sl大法重新进行当前关卡。
非常推荐入手。

Soo fun!!!! Couldn't put the controller for hours. Only thing that mage me stop was being awake till 3am on a school night. Got two hours of sleep. Best game i've ever played. Easter eggs are the best. Keep vigilant for them. Plus the turret song or turret synphony, is soo cool, almost brought me to tears when i learned it was the end of that amazing adventure. My absolute favorite part was the old experiment area in the basement. My favorite character was the orb dude that follows you around. Even though he ends up as a bad guy, if it was real life i would just perminately disconnect him and keep him as a friend, the only other humanoid with a conchinence. Best game ever of all games !!!!!!!!

Melhor jogo

As if this game needed another review.

Everything is great about portal 2. The gameplay, the voice acting (especially Chell), the characters... you name it. The story is good, although nothing too fancy.

 But the core of Portal are, of course, the portals. The puzzles can be really challenging and that's what makes this game so good. I love puzzles, and the game forces you to think out of the box. If you like mind-challenging stuff, then buy the game already.

But its brilliance doesn't stop there. Glados (the antagonist) has a lot of personality and really brings life to the game. Her lines are great, and she's gonna make you laugh quite a bit. Another great example of this are the turrets. They're really simple and don't have too many voice lines, but they're full of personality and help shape the game's atmosphere. Besides, they're f***ing cute.

The environment, although very similar most of the time, is dynamically changing so you never get bored.

Perhaps the one thing I didn't like too much was the music, but it's not that big of a deal.

Finally, the game is ridiculously cheap. There really is nothing to think; if you haven't played this game, buy it already!
Perfecta continuación de lo que fue el primer Portal. Este juego lleva ese concepto "más de lo mismo, pero mejor" a buen nivel, sin limitarse a dar entregar lo mismo, pero con nuevos niveles.

I honestly adore this game.
I love how everything is laid out in the story, the characters are great, and some of the puzzles are so great and planned out that even after solving them multiple times, I'm still stumped!
That, and Valve is pretty great. If not consistant.

玩游戏的时候，我不知道啊该怎么加游戏内字幕，主角与机器伙伴的交谈我也只能凭自己拙劣的四级英语去猜测。后来因为卡关找攻略看到了游戏中文剧情，在还没有结束游戏的时候我找到了篇较为详细的剧情介绍看了一下，我能感受到这游戏背后的故事很有思想的力。在游戏的最后，在面对那些曾经想要杀死她的机器面前听到了它们为她演唱的歌曲《Cara mia Addio》,我看着背后巨大的母体机器人，我突然感觉他们都有了温度和感情，再加上优秀的剧情，我顿时有了泪目的感觉。因为一直陪伴我的并不是冰冷的机器，也不是一心想置我于死地的机枪射手，手里一直攥着的土豆也会吐槽，误入歧途的机器人也会向我表示歉意，我感觉我并不是玩了一款单机游戏那么简单。最后当主角被土豆送回地面时，面前是一片金黄色的平原，转身回头是紧锁的铁门，我并没有解放的感觉，想反的，我感觉我失去了很多朋友。
¿A que esperas para comprarlo?

+ Игры за продолжительность , портал я прошел 4 раза за 8 ч , а портал 2 я прошел 2 раза за 21 час , ну теперь сравните .
А еще добавим сюда великолепную оптимизацию , продвинутую графику , co-op режим со своими картами и даже если надоест , можешь поиграть с другом в карты скачанные с workshop"а или эти самые карты можешь пройти один ( точнее карты из workshop заточеный под одиночку )
